node.name: Sigasi VHDL Plugin
node.shortdescription:
Sigasi offers the leading VHDL plugin for Eclipse:
  • Makes standard editors obsolete.
  • Type-time code analysis
  • Error reporting while you type
  • Smart content assist
  • Code inspection and navigation
  • Design hierarchy view
  • Syntax highlighting for Verilog and AHDL
Check out a the 1 minute introduction video and the feature list.
Sigasi 2.x is an intelligent development environment (IDE) for the VHDL language. As other xDT plugins, such as JDT and CDT, it contains an ultra-fast VHDL parser and compiler that runs transparently in the background. At any given moment as you make modifications, the tool fully understands the design in terms of VHDL concepts.

Starter Edition

This plugin can be used free of charge. For small projects, all of the Pro features will be available. If you want to try the full version, please request a trial license or buy a license on the Sigasi website.

Sigasi 2.x is an intelligent development environment (IDE) for the VHDL language. As other xDT plugins, such as JDT and CDT, it contains an ultra-fast VHDL parser and compiler that runs transparently in the background. At any given moment as you make modifications, the tool fully understands the design in terms of VHDL concepts.
